adv: It's easy to filter categories. The related views are helpful for exploring the dataset. It doesn't feel hard to navigate, and the filter categories can always be seen.
disadv: It doesn't define any terms, so it could be confusing for people unfamiliar with movies and different kinds of ratings. It can be slow to load the charts. Using different sized circles is a bit confusing since there are different number of records of the same value and I didn't understand that a shaded circle could be there are various different values that are big and small.
